Parameters: DatePicker: The view associated with this listener.
int: The year that was set.
int: The month that was set (0-11) for compatibility with @B_java#util#Calendar_E@.
int: The day of the month that was set.
onDateChanged(android.widget.DatePicker,.FullName: public abstract void onDateChanged (DatePicker view, int year, int monthOfYear, int dayOfMonth)

ClassDesc: The callback used to indicate the user changed the date.
